summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of North and West Seventy-fourth Street from Fremont Avenue to Eighth Avenue Northwest, et al. in the City of Seattle, by laying watermains under Ordinance No. 21613, creating Local Improvement District No. 2154 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
